sentences.en: Despite new technologies, the magic of the darkroom still fascinates me.
sentences.cn: 尽管有新技术，暗房的魔力仍然叫我着迷。

sentences.en: Along with healing, your subconscious darkroom is where your wealth is produced.
sentences.cn: 你的这座潜意识的暗室，是你的病被治愈的地方，也是你的财富诞生的所在。

sentences.en: You can control their shooting parameters on the camera canva just like Darkroom.
sentences.cn: 就像应用“暗房”，你可以控制相圈上的拍摄参数。
